definition: to go to bed/(coll.) to have sex
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Baloney. He's usually in bed by now.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，到现在这个钟点，他已经上床睡觉了。

sentences.english: I take the urn to bed with me, and I talk to him about my day.
sentences.chinese: 我带着骨灰罐子上床，跟他说我这一天怎么过的。

sentences.english: At 38 - She tells you a story and takes you to bed.
sentences.chinese: 在她38岁的时候，她给你讲个故事然后带你上床。

sentences.english: At night before he went to bed he practiced sitting with his legs crossed, and then he stretched his back by curling himself into a ball.
sentences.chinese: 晚上上床之前，他练习盘腿坐，然后把背弯成一个球。

sentences.english: He went to lie down after a long journey.
sentences.chinese: 在长途旅行以后，他躺上床休息了。

sentences.english: I am dog-tired today; I'd better go to bed now.
sentences.chinese: 我今天累得象条狗一样，我最好现在就上床睡觉。

sentences.english: She unpinned her hair before going to bed.
My daughter didn't go to bed until Teletubbies ended.
sentences.chinese: 我女儿直到《天线宝宝》结束才肯上床睡觉。

sentences.english: She marched the little boy up to bed.
sentences.chinese: 她打发这小男孩上床睡觉。

sentences.english: The old man came into the room, took off his clothes and went to bed.
sentences.chinese: 这位老人走进屋，脱下衣服，然后上床睡觉了。

sentences.english: It is illegal to go to bed without first having a full bath.
sentences.chinese: 未先洗全身澡就上床睡觉是违法的。

sentences.english: The next day he slept with her and he talked to her about the Bible.
sentences.chinese: 第二天他跟她上床了，他跟她讲了基督教的《圣经》。

sentences.english: That night we all went to sleep uneasy.
sentences.chinese: 当晚我们忐忑不安的上床睡觉。

sentences.english: She said she was told to sleep with her husband, but refused.
sentences.chinese: 她说她被逼和丈夫上床，但她拒绝了。

sentences.english: I drank a couple of brandies before going to bed and slept like a log.
sentences.chinese: 我上床前喝了几杯白兰地酒，因此就睡得很熟。

sentences.english: To have to go to bed by day?

definition: to share the bed/(fig.) to be married
to go to sleep/to go to bed (literary)
to have sexual relations with sb/to have dealings with
quilt wrapped around the body as a tube (traditional bedding)/(contemporary) bedding/quilt/blankets/cover/bed
to get out of bed/to get up
